Melbourne.Anchorage Yacht Basin:
Anchorage Yacht Basin is a historic marina at the junction of the Indian River and Banana River at Indian Harbor Beach, Melbourne, Florida.
Anchorage Yacht Basin is a second generation family owned marina. Anchorage Yacht Basin can be found on nautical charts at 28°08′23″N 80°36′03″W directly across from the Merritt Island Dragon, (Dragon Point).
